name: Family Issues
description:
Evil raptor has stolen you eggs, you must find them back before they are eaten, You are one very angry dino mom.

Controls:

W,A,S,D For movement, 'Q' -key for Tail-Whip attack Ctrl or Left Mouse Button to Shoot.

Made In BayJam 2017 game jam event, theme was The Fiirst

Team:

Matti Anttila
Trần Duy Hưng
Aatu Paukkonen
Jan Tuovinen
